transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning, mam. Shivam baat kar raha hu main.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Haan, mam phir aapne kuch iske bare mein inquiry ki thi jo aapke service chal rahi hai IndiaMART ke regarding kuch.
Executive: Uh, kaunsi sir?
Customer: Mam jo aapki service chal rahi hai IndiaMART, Neutra Flex company ki, mam uske regarding baat kar raha hu main.
Executive: Sir, main aapki na thodi der baad sir se baat kara deti hu.
Customer: Haanji karaiye mam.
Executive: Haanji, main abhi thode time, uh, 30 minutes tak aapki sir ke sath baat kara deti hu. Mere ko is bare mein knowledge nahi hai, aap sir se baat kar lijiye.
Customer: Theek hai mam, tab tak main aapko contact karenge aap?
Executive: Yes sir, yes sir.
Customer: Okay, okay, sure mam.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about IndiaMART Neutra Flex service.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect customer to her senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect in 30 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- indiamart, service, neutra flex
